item.title: Taiwan shaken by 6.5 mag quake...
item.description:
apnews.com
TAIPEI, Taiwan (AP) — An earthquake shook Taiwan's capital, Taipei, on Sunday and caused falling rocks that injured a woman and damaged a car. No deaths were reported. The 6.5-magnitude quake struck at 1:11 p.m.

item.title: German police stop far-right vigilantes patrolling Polish border...
item.description:
www.reuters.com
German police said on Sunday they had stopped more than 50 far-right vigilantes armed with pepper spray, a bayonet, a machete and batons who were trying to patrol the Polish border to stop migrants from entering the country.

item.title: Inside the jaw-clenching world of cricket fighting...
item.description:
www.npr.org
It's cricket fighting season in China, so NPR went ringside to learn about the centuries-old sport. Turns out, the bugs are really high maintenance, big money's involved and big mandibles matter.

item.title: Tragic End of Scientology's Biggest Pop Star...
item.description:
news.yahoo.com
Photo Illustration by The Daily Beast / Photos GettyOn April 22, the day before he died, Jakub Stepniak recorded a phone message for one of his doctors.He is barely audible in it. He thanks his doctor for calling him and, barely above a whisper, says that he is there with his uncle, and that “the inflammation is so bad.” He then says something about trying to reach another doctor. And he finishes the message with an ominous final utterance: “I don’t know if I’ll survive to the morning.”The next
